title: Is the Casio 991 EX allowed in the Cambridge IGCSE Math exam (0580)? - Quora
tags: International General Certificate of Secondary Education (IGCSE)

response.answer_text: I get this one a LOT… For future reference click here. It basically lays down the guidelines for the kind of calculators that CANNOT be used in MATH (0580) exam and I list them below. Calculators with any of the following facilities are prohibited, unless specifically stated otherwise in the syllabus: graphic displaydata banksdictionaries or language translatorsretrieval or manipulation of text or formulaeQWERTY keyboardsbuilt-in symbolic algebraic manipulationssymbolic differentiation or integrationcapability of remote communication with other machines.Now, about the Casio 991 EX.  I am pretty sure this can store and retrieve formulae. So to answer your question, no, you cannot use this one.
